item.title: How to add and delete objects?
item.dc:creator: @Destroyed_32 Destroyed 32
item.description:
@Destroyed_32 wrote:

  1. Click right on the Object, there you see that:

code[/code] (the numbers can be other!)

Than search for them in your client.java. If you find it, and EVERYTHING is right (like the Object ID etc.), than delete this line and you are Done!
EXAMPLE LINE WHAT YOU CAN DELETE:

makeGlobalObject(3509, 3508, 2213, -1, 10); //bank

  1. Open your client.java

Than search for

    public void Deleteobjects() {

Scroll a little bit down. Than you find that:

deletethatwall(2891, 3511); // door deletethatwall(2891, 3510); // door deletethatwall(2790, 3177); // door deletethatwall(2794, 3180); // door deletethatwall(3183, 3434); // door deletethatwall(2816, 3183); // gate 1 deletethatwall(2816, 3182); // gate 2 deletethatwall(2847, 9637); // gate 3 deletethatwall(2847, 9636); // gate 4 deletethatwall(2836, 9600); // wall deletethatwall(2811, 3170); // wall deletethatwall(3292, 3167); // wall deletethatwall(3287, 3171); // wall deletethatwall(3293, 3167); // wall deletethatwall(3298, 3171); // wall deletethatobject(3503, 3484); // tree at canifis deletethatobject(3495, 3476); // barstool at canifis deletethatobject(3493, 3485); // Sign at idk lol deletethatobject(3183, 3447); // stairs at varrock bank deletethatobject(3180, 3433); // bank debosit box deletethatobject(2746, 3460); // stairs at shops deletethatobject(2728, 3460); // stairs at shops deletethatobject(3180, 3443); // Bank Table deletethatobject(2799, 3154); // new training area for Mod Steve deletethatobject(2798, 3156); // new training area for Mod Steve deletethatobject(2797, 3156); // new training area for Mod Steve

IT CAN BE A LITTLE BIT OTHER AT YOU!

Than, add a new Line what is called:

	deletethatobject(3333, 4444); // Description

The numbers in the " ( ) " are the Currently Position of the Object! You can find them when you click RIGHT on the Object…

For Description just use something, what you want

Than you are done!

MfG, Destroyed
